document.full_text: some of the united states' biggest creditors moved to shore up confidence in its sovereign debt tuesday after standard & poor's threatened to cut its credit rating on the world's top economy, touching a nerve among big holders of treasuries.
document.title: with much at stake, asia voices confidence in u.s. debt
lines_and_colors: some of the united states' biggest creditors moved to shore up confidence in its sovereign debt tuesday after standard & poor's threatened to cut its credit rating on the world's top economy, touching a nerve among big holders of treasuries.
